remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  Show that f(r) is different on and off the ` P .\/ Q ` line.  TODO:  FIX COMMENT (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2013.)
statement:
cdleme41.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme41.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme41.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme41.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme41.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme41.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme41.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme41.d $e |- D = ( ( s .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ s ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme41.e $e |- E = ( ( t .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ t ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme41.g $e |- G = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( E .\/ ( ( s .\/ t ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme41.i $e |- I = ( iota_ y e. B A. t e. A ( ( -. t .<_ W /\ -. t .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> y = G ) ) $.
cdleme41.n $e |- N = if ( s .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) , I , D ) $.
cdleme41sn3aw $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) /\ ( S e. A /\ -. S .<_ W ) ) /\ ( R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ -. S .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ R =/= S ) ) -> [_ R / s ]_ N =/= [_ S / s ]_ N ) $.

$d .<_ s t y $.
$d .\/ s t y $.

$d B s t y $.
$d D y $.
